2486

    
    

    
                    channel->_CmdBuffer[0].ClipRect = merge_clip_rect.ToVec4();

    


    

    
2487

    
    

    
                    memcpy(dst_tmp++, channel, sizeof(ImDrawChannel));

    


    

    
2488

    
    

    
                }

    


    

    
2489

    
    

    
            }

    


    

    
2490

    
    

    

    


    

    
2491

    
    

    
            // Make sure Bg2DrawChannelUnfrozen appears in the middle of our groups (whereas Bg0/Bg1 and Bg2 frozen are fixed to 0 and 1)

    


    

    
2492

    
    

    
            if (merge_group_n == 1 && has_freeze_v)

    


    

    
2493

    
    

    
                memcpy(dst_tmp++, &splitter->_Channels[table->Bg2DrawChannelUnfrozen], sizeof(ImDrawChannel));

    


    

    
2494

    
    

    
        }

    


    

    
2495

    
    

    

    


    

    
2496

    
    

    
        // Append unmergeable channels that we didn't reorder at the end of the list

    


    

    
2497

    
    

    
        for (int n = 0; n < splitter->_Count && remaining_count != 0; n++)

    


    

    
2498

    
    

    
        {

    


    

    
2499

    
    

    
            if (!remaining_mask.TestBit(n))

    


    

    
2500

    
    

    
                continue;

    


    

    
2501

    
    

    
            ImDrawChannel* channel = &splitter->_Channels[n];

    


    

    
2502

    
    

    
            memcpy(dst_tmp++, channel, sizeof(ImDrawChannel));

    


    

    
2503

    
    

    
            remaining_count--;

    


    

    
2504

    
    

    
        }

    


    

    
2505

    
    

    
        IM_ASSERT(dst_tmp == g.DrawChannelsTempMergeBuffer.Data + g.DrawChannelsTempMergeBuffer.Size);

    


    

    
2506

    
    

    
        memcpy(splitter->_Channels.Data + LEADING_DRAW_CHANNELS, g.DrawChannelsTempMergeBuffer.Data, (splitter->_Count - LEADING_DRAW_CHANNELS) * sizeof(ImDrawChannel));

    


    

    
2507

    
    

    
    }

    


    

    
2508

    
    

    
}

    


    

    
2509

    
    

    

    


    

    
2510

    
    

    
// FIXME-TABLE: This is a mess, need to redesign how we render borders (as some are also done in TableEndRow)

    


    

    
2511

    
    

    
void ImGui::TableDrawBorders(ImGuiTable* table)

    


    

    
2512

    
    

    
{

    


    

    
2513

    
    

    
    ImGuiWindow* inner_window = table->InnerWindow;

    


    

    
2514

    
    

    
    if (!table->OuterWindow->ClipRect.Overlaps(table->OuterRect))

    


    

    
2515

    
    

    
        return;

    


    

    
2516

    
    

    

    


    

    
2517

    
    

    
    ImDrawList* inner_drawlist = inner_window->DrawList;

    


    

    
2518

    
    

    
    table->DrawSplitter->SetCurrentChannel(inner_drawlist, TABLE_DRAW_CHANNEL_BG0);

    


    

    
2519

    
    

    
    inner_drawlist->PushClipRect(table->Bg0ClipRectForDrawCmd.Min, table->Bg0ClipRectForDrawCmd.Max, false);

    


    

    
2520

    
    

    

    


    

    
2521

    
    

    
    // Draw inner border and resizing feedback

    


    

    
2522

    
    

    
    ImGuiTableInstanceData* table_instance = TableGetInstanceData(table, table->InstanceCurrent);

    


    

    
2523

    
    

    
    const float border_size = TABLE_BORDER_SIZE;

    


    

    
2524

    
    

    
    const float draw_y1 = table->InnerRect.Min.y;

    


    

    
2525

    
    

    
    const float draw_y2_body = table->InnerRect.Max.y;

    


    

    
2526

    
    

    
    const float draw_y2_head = table->IsUsingHeaders ? ImMin(table->InnerRect.Max.y, (table->FreezeRowsCount >= 1 ? table->InnerRect.Min.y : table->WorkRect.Min.y) + table_instance->LastFirstRowHeight) : draw_y1;

    


    

    
2527

    
    

    
    if (table->Flags & ImGuiTableFlags_BordersInnerV)

    


    

    
2528

    
    

    
    {

    


    

    
2529

    
    

    
        for (int order_n = 0; order_n < table->ColumnsCount; order_n++)

    


    

    
2530

    
    

    
        {

    


    

    
2531

    
    

    
            if (!(table->EnabledMaskByDisplayOrder & ((ImU64)1 << order_n)))

    


    

    
2532

    
    

    
                continue;

    


    

    
2533

    
    

    

    


    

    
2534

    
    

    
            const int column_n = table->DisplayOrderToIndex[order_n];

    


    

    
2535

    
    

    
            ImGuiTableColumn* column = &table->Columns[column_n];

    


    

    
2536

    
    

    
            const bool is_hovered = (table->HoveredColumnBorder == column_n);

    


    

    
2537

    
    

    
            const bool is_resized = (table->ResizedColumn == column_n) && (table->InstanceInteracted == table->InstanceCurrent);

    


    

    
2538

    
    

    
            const bool is_resizable = (column->Flags & (ImGuiTableColumnFlags_NoResize | ImGuiTableColumnFlags_NoDirectResize_)) == 0;

    


    

    
2539

    
    

    
            const bool is_frozen_separator = (table->FreezeColumnsCount == order_n + 1);

    


    

    
2540

    
    

    
            if (column->MaxX > table->InnerClipRect.Max.x && !is_resized)

    


    

    
2541

    
    

    
                continue;

    


    

    
2542

    
    

    

    


    

    
2543

    
    

    
            // Decide whether right-most column is visible

    


    

    
2544

    
    

    
            if (column->NextEnabledColumn == -1 && !is_resizable)

    


    

    
2545

    
    

    
                if ((table->Flags & ImGuiTableFlags_SizingMask_) != ImGuiTableFlags_SizingFixedSame || (table->Flags & ImGuiTableFlags_NoHostExtendX))

    


    

    
2546

    
    

    
                    continue;

    


    

    
2547

    
    

    
            if (column->MaxX <= column->ClipRect.Min.x) // FIXME-TABLE FIXME-STYLE: Assume BorderSize==1, this is problematic if we want to increase the border size..

    


    

    
2548

    
    

    
                continue;

    


    

    
2549

    
    

    

    


    

    
2550

    
    

    
            // Draw in outer window so right-most column won't be clipped

    


    

    
2551

    
    

    
            // Always draw full height border when being resized/hovered, or on the delimitation of frozen column scrolling.

    


    

    
2552

    
    

    
            ImU32 col;

    


    

    
2553

    
    

    
            float draw_y2;

    


    

    
2554

    
    

    
            if (is_hovered || is_resized || is_frozen_separator)

    


    

    
2555

    
    

    
            {

    


    

    
2556

    
    

    
                draw_y2 = draw_y2_body;

    


    

    
2557

    
    

    
                col = is_resized ? GetColorU32(ImGuiCol_SeparatorActive) : is_hovered ? GetColorU32(ImGuiCol_SeparatorHovered) : table->BorderColorStrong;

    


    

    
2558

    
    

    
            }

    


    

    
2559

    
    

    
            else

    


    

    
2560

    
    

    
            {

    


    

    
2561

    
    

    
                draw_y2 = (table->Flags & (ImGuiTableFlags_NoBordersInBody | ImGuiTableFlags_NoBordersInBodyUntilResize)) ? draw_y2_head : draw_y2_body;

    


    

    
2562

    
    

    
                col = (table->Flags & (ImGuiTableFlags_NoBordersInBody | ImGuiTableFlags_NoBordersInBodyUntilResize)) ? table->BorderColorStrong : table->BorderColorLight;

    


    

    
2563

    
    

    
            }

    


    

    
2564

    
    

    

    


    

    
2565

    
    

    
            if (draw_y2 > draw_y1)

    


    

    
2566

    
    

    
                inner_drawlist->AddLine(ImVec2(column->MaxX, draw_y1), ImVec2(column->MaxX, draw_y2), col, border_size);

    


    

    
2567

    
    

    
        }

    


    

    
2568

    
    

    
    }

    


    

    
2569

    
    

    

    


    

    
2570

    
    

    
    // Draw outer border

    


    

    
2571

    
    

    
    // FIXME: could use AddRect or explicit VLine/HLine helper?

    


    

    
2572

    
    

    
    if (table->Flags & ImGuiTableFlags_BordersOuter)

    


    

    
2573

    
    

    
    {

    


    

    
2574

    
    

    
        // Display outer border offset by 1 which is a simple way to display it without adding an extra draw call

    


    

    
2575

    
    

    
        // (Without the offset, in outer_window it would be rendered behind cells, because child windows are above their

    


    

    
2576

    
    

    
        // parent. In inner_window, it won't reach out over scrollbars. Another weird solution would be to display part

    


    

    
2577

    
    

    
        // of it in inner window, and the part that's over scrollbars in the outer window..)

    


    

    
2578

    
    

    
        // Either solution currently won't allow us to use a larger border size: the border would clipped.

    


    

    
2579

    
    

    
        const ImRect outer_border = table->OuterRect;

    


    

    
2580

    
    

    
        const ImU32 outer_col = table->BorderColorStrong;

    


    

    
2581

    
    

    
        if ((table->Flags & ImGuiTableFlags_BordersOuter) == ImGuiTableFlags_BordersOuter)

    


    

    
2582

    
    

    
        {

    


    

    
2583

    
    

    
            inner_drawlist->AddRect(outer_border.Min, outer_border.Max, outer_col, 0.0f, 0, border_size);

    


    

    
2584

    
    

    
        }

    


    

    
2585

    
    

    
        else if (table->Flags & ImGuiTableFlags_BordersOuterV)

    


    

    
2586

    
    

    
        {

    


    

    
2587

    
    

    
            inner_drawlist->AddLine(outer_border.Min, ImVec2(outer_border.Min.x, outer_border.Max.y), outer_col, border_size);

    


    

    
2588

    
    

    
            inner_drawlist->AddLine(ImVec2(outer_border.Max.x, outer_border.Min.y), outer_border.Max, outer_col, border_size);

    


    

    
2589

    
    

    
        }

    


    

    
2590

    
    

    
        else if (table->Flags & ImGuiTableFlags_BordersOuterH)

    


    

    
2591

    
    

    
        {

    


    

    
2592

    
    

    
            inner_drawlist->AddLine(outer_border.Min, ImVec2(outer_border.Max.x, outer_border.Min.y), outer_col, border_size);

    


    

    
2593

    
    

    
            inner_drawlist->AddLine(ImVec2(outer_border.Min.x, outer_border.Max.y), outer_border.Max, outer_col, border_size);

    


    

    
2594

    
    

    
        }

    


    

    
2595

    
    

    
    }

    


    

    
2596

    
    

    
    if ((table->Flags & ImGuiTableFlags_BordersInnerH) && table->RowPosY2 < table->OuterRect.Max.y)

    


    

    
2597

    
    

    
    {

    


    

    
2598

    
    

    
        // Draw bottom-most row border

    


    

    
2599

    
    

    
        const float border_y = table->RowPosY2;

    


    

    
2600

    
    

    
        if (border_y >= table->BgClipRect.Min.y && border_y < table->BgClipRect.Max.y)

    


    

    
2601

    
    

    
            inner_drawlist->AddLine(ImVec2(table->BorderX1, border_y), ImVec2(table->BorderX2, border_y), table->BorderColorLight, border_size);

    


    

    
2602

    
    

    
    }

    


    

    
2603

    
    

    

    


    

    
2604

    
    

    
    inner_drawlist->PopClipRect();

    


    

    
2605

    
    

    
}

    


    

    
2606

    
    

    

    


    

    
2607

    
    

    
//-------------------------------------------------------------------------

    


    

    
2608

    
    

    
// [SECTION] Tables: Sorting

    


    

    
2609

    
    

    
//-------------------------------------------------------------------------

    


    

    
2610

    
    

    
// - TableGetSortSpecs()

    


    

    
2611

    
    

    
// - TableFixColumnSortDirection() [Internal]

    


    

    
2612

    
    

    
// - TableGetColumnNextSortDirection() [Internal]

    


    

    
2613

    
    

    
// - TableSetColumnSortDirection() [Internal]

    


    

    
2614

    
    

    
// - TableSortSpecsSanitize() [Internal]

    


    

    
2615

    
    

    
// - TableSortSpecsBuild() [Internal]

    


    

    
2616

    
    

    
//-------------------------------------------------------------------------

    


    

    
2617

    
    

    

    


    

    
2618

    
    

    
// Return NULL if no sort specs (most often when ImGuiTableFlags_Sortable is not set)

    


    

    
2619

    
    

    
// You can sort your data again when 'SpecsChanged == true'. It will be true with sorting specs have changed since

    


    

    
2620

    
    

    
// last call, or the first time.

    


    

    
2621

    
    

    
// Lifetime: don't hold on this pointer over multiple frames or past any subsequent call to BeginTable()!

    


    

    
2622

    
    

    
ImGuiTableSortSpecs* ImGui::TableGetSortSpecs()

    


    

    
2623

    
    

    
{

    


    

    
2624

    
    

    
    ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;

    


    

    
2625

    
    

    
    ImGuiTable* table = g.CurrentTable;

    


    

    
2626

    
    

    
    IM_ASSERT(table != NULL);

    


    

    
2627

    
    

    

    


    

    
2628

    
    

    
    if (!(table->Flags & ImGuiTableFlags_Sortable))

    


    

    
2629

    
    

    
        return NULL;

    


    

    
2630

    
    

    

    


    

    
2631

    
    

    
    // Require layout (in case TableHeadersRow() hasn't been called) as it may alter IsSortSpecsDirty in some paths.

    


    

    
2632

    
    

    
    if (!table->IsLayoutLocked)

    


    

    
2633

    
    

    
        TableUpdateLayout(table);

    


    

    
2634

    
    

    

    


    

    
2635

    
    

    
    TableSortSpecsBuild(table);

    


    

    
2636

    
    

    

    


    

    
2637

    
    

    
    return &table->SortSpecs;

    


    

    
2638

    
    

    
}

    


    

    
2639

    
    

    

    


    

    
2640

    
    

    
static inline ImGuiSortDirection TableGetColumnAvailSortDirection(ImGuiTableColumn* column, int n)

    


    

    
2641

    
    

    
{

    


    

    
2642

    
    

    
    IM_ASSERT(n < column->SortDirectionsAvailCount);

    


    

    
2643

    
    

    
    return (column->SortDirectionsAvailList >> (n << 1)) & 0x03;

    


    

    
2644

    
    

    
}

    


    

    
2645

    
    

    

    


    

    
2646

    
    

    
// Fix sort direction if currently set on a value which is unavailable (e.g. activating NoSortAscending/NoSortDescending)

    


    

    
2647

    
    

    
void ImGui::TableFixColumnSortDirection(ImGuiTable* table, ImGuiTableColumn* column)

    


    

    
2648

    
    

    
{

    


    

    
2649

    
    

    
    if (column->SortOrder == -1 || (column->SortDirectionsAvailMask & (1 << column->SortDirection)) != 0)

    


    

    
2650

    
    

    
        return;

    


    

    
2651

    
    

    
    column->SortDirection = (ImU8)TableGetColumnAvailSortDirection(column, 0);

    


    

    
2652

    
    

    
    table->IsSortSpecsDirty = true;

    


    

    
2653

    
    

    
}

    


    

    
2654

    
    

    

    


    

    
2655

    
    

    
// Calculate next sort direction that would be set after clicking the column

    


    

    
2656

    
    

    
// - If the PreferSortDescending flag is set, we will default to a Descending direction on the first click.

    


    

    
2657

    
    

    
// - Note that the PreferSortAscending flag is never checked, it is essentially the default and therefore a no-op.

    


    

    
2658

    
    

    
IM_STATIC_ASSERT(ImGuiSortDirection_None == 0 && ImGuiSortDirection_Ascending == 1 && ImGuiSortDirection_Descending == 2);

    


    

    
2659

    
    

    
ImGuiSortDirection ImGui::TableGetColumnNextSortDirection(ImGuiTableColumn* column)

    


    

    
2660

    
    

    
{

    


    

    
2661

    
    

    
    IM_ASSERT(column->SortDirectionsAvailCount > 0);

    


    

    
2662

    
    

    
    if (column->SortOrder == -1)

    


    

    
2663

    
    

    
        return TableGetColumnAvailSortDirection(column, 0);

    


    

    
2664

    
    

    
    for (int n = 0; n < 3; n++)

    


    

    
2665

    
    

    
        if (column->SortDirection == TableGetColumnAvailSortDirection(column, n))

    


    

    
2666

    
    

    
            return TableGetColumnAvailSortDirection(column, (n + 1) % column->SortDirectionsAvailCount);

    


    

    
2667

    
    

    
    IM_ASSERT(0);

    


    

    
2668

    
    

    
    return ImGuiSortDirection_None;

    


    

    
2669

    
    

    
}

    


    

    
2670

    
    

    

    


    

    
2671

    
    

    
// Note that the NoSortAscending/NoSortDescending flags are processed in TableSortSpecsSanitize(), and they may change/revert

    


    

    
2672

    
    

    
// the value of SortDirection. We could technically also do it here but it would be unnecessary and duplicate code.

    


    

    
2673

    
    

    
void ImGui::TableSetColumnSortDirection(int column_n, ImGuiSortDirection sort_direction, bool append_to_sort_specs)

    


    

    
2674

    
    

    
{

    


    

    
2675

    
    

    
    ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;

    


    

    
2676

    
    

    
    ImGuiTable* table = g.CurrentTable;

    


    

    
2677

    
    

    

    


    

    
2678

    
    

    
    if (!(table->Flags & ImGuiTableFlags_SortMulti))

    


    

    
2679

    
    

    
        append_to_sort_specs = false;

    


    

    
2680

    
    

    
    if (!(table->Flags & ImGuiTableFlags_SortTristate))

    


    

    
2681

    
    

    
        IM_ASSERT(sort_direction != ImGuiSortDirection_None);

    


    

    
2682

    
    

    

    


    

    
2683

    
    

    
    ImGuiTableColumnIdx sort_order_max = 0;

    


    

    
2684

    
    

    
    if (append_to_sort_specs)

    


    

    
2685

    
    

    
        for (int other_column_n = 0; other_column_n < table->ColumnsCount; other_column_n++)

    


    

    
2686

    
    

    
            sort_order_max = ImMax(sort_order_max, table->Columns[other_column_n].SortOrder);

    


    

    
2687

    
    

    

    


    

    
2688

    
    

    
    ImGuiTableColumn* column = &table->Columns[column_n];

    


    

    
2689

    
    

    
    column->SortDirection = (ImU8)sort_direction;

    


    

    
2690

    
    

    
    if (column->SortDirection == ImGuiSortDirection_None)

    


    

    
2691

    
    

    
        column->SortOrder = -1;

    


    

    
2692

    
    

    
    else if (column->SortOrder == -1 || !append_to_sort_specs)

    


    

    
2693

    
    

    
        column->SortOrder = append_to_sort_specs ? sort_order_max + 1 : 0;

    


    

    
2694

    
    

    

    


    

    
2695

    
    

    
    for (int other_column_n = 0; other_column_n < table->ColumnsCount; other_column_n++)

    


    

    
2696

    
    

    
    {

    


    

    
2697

    
    

    
        ImGuiTableColumn* other_column = &table->Columns[other_column_n];

    


    

    
2698

    
    

    
        if (other_column != column && !append_to_sort_specs)

    


    

    
2699

    
    

    
            other_column->SortOrder = -1;

    


    

    
2700

    
    

    
        TableFixColumnSortDirection(table, other_column);

    


    

    
2701

    
    

    
    }

    


    

    
2702

    
    

    
    table->IsSettingsDirty = true;

    


    

    
2703

    
    

    
    table->IsSortSpecsDirty = true;

    


    

    
2704

    
    

    
}

    


    

    
2705

    
    

    

    


    

    
2706

    
    

    
void ImGui::TableSortSpecsSanitize(ImGuiTable* table)

    


    

    
2707

    
    

    
{

    


    

    
2708

    
    

    
    IM_ASSERT(table->Flags & ImGuiTableFlags_Sortable);

    


    

    
2709

    
    

    

    


    

    
2710

    
    

    
    // Clear SortOrder from hidden column and verify that there's no gap or duplicate.

    


    

    
2711

    
    

    
    int sort_order_count = 0;

    


    

    
2712

    
    

    
    ImU64 sort_order_mask = 0x00;

    


    

    
2713

    
    

    
    for (int column_n = 0; column_n < table->ColumnsCount; column_n++)

    


    

    
2714

    
    

    
    {

    


    

    
2715

    
    

    
        ImGuiTableColumn* column = &table->Columns[column_n];

    


    

    
2716

    
    

    
        if (column->SortOrder != -1 && !column->IsEnabled)

    


    

    
2717

    
    

    
            column->SortOrder = -1;

    


    

    
2718

    
    

    
        if (column->SortOrder == -1)

    


    

    
2719

    
    

    
            continue;

    


    

    
2720

    
    

    
        sort_order_count++;

    


    

    
2721

    
    

    
        sort_order_mask |= ((ImU64)1 << column->SortOrder);

    


    

    
2722

    
    

    
        IM_ASSERT(sort_order_count < (int)sizeof(sort_order_mask) * 8);

    


    

    
2723

    
    

    
    }

    


    

    
2724

    
    

    

    


    

    
2725

    
    

    
    const bool need_fix_linearize = ((ImU64)1 << sort_order_count) != (sort_order_mask + 1);

    


    

    
2726

    
    

    
    const bool need_fix_single_sort_order = (sort_order_count > 1) && !(table->Flags & ImGuiTableFlags_SortMulti);

    


    

    
2727

    
    

    
    if (need_fix_linearize || need_fix_single_sort_order)

    


    

    
2728

    
    

    
    {

    


    

    
2729

    
    

    
        ImU64 fixed_mask = 0x00;

    


    

    
2730

    
    

    
        for (int sort_n = 0; sort_n < sort_order_count; sort_n++)

    


    

    
2731

    
    

    
        {

    


    

    
2732

    
    

    
            // Fix: Rewrite sort order fields if needed so they have no gap or duplicate.

    


    

    
2733

    
    

    
            // (e.g. SortOrder 0 disappeared, SortOrder 1..2 exists --> rewrite then as SortOrder 0..1)

    


    

    
2734

    
    

    
            int column_with_smallest_sort_order = -1;

    


    

    
2735

    
    

    
            for (int column_n = 0; column_n < table->ColumnsCount; column_n++)

    


    

    
2736

    
    

    
                if ((fixed_mask & ((ImU64)1 << (ImU64)column_n)) == 0 && table->Columns[column_n].SortOrder != -1)

    


    

    
2737

    
    

    
                    if (column_with_smallest_sort_order == -1 || table->Columns[column_n].SortOrder < table->Columns[column_with_smallest_sort_order].SortOrder)

    


    

    
2738

    
    

    
                        column_with_smallest_sort_order = column_n;

    


    

    
2739

    
    

    
            IM_ASSERT(column_with_smallest_sort_order != -1);

    


    

    
2740

    
    

    
            fixed_mask |= ((ImU64)1 << column_with_smallest_sort_order);

    


    

    
2741

    
    

    
            table->Columns[column_with_smallest_sort_order].SortOrder = (ImGuiTableColumnIdx)sort_n;

    


    

    
2742

    
    

    

    


    

    
2743

    
    

    
            // Fix: Make sure only one column has a SortOrder if ImGuiTableFlags_MultiSortable is not set.

    


    

    
2744

    
    

    
            if (need_fix_single_sort_order)

    


    

    
2745

    
    

    
            {

    


    

    
2746

    
    

    
                sort_order_count = 1;

    


    

    
2747

    
    

    
                for (int column_n = 0; column_n < table->ColumnsCount; column_n++)

    


    

    
2748

    
    

    
                    if (column_n != column_with_smallest_sort_order)

    


    

    
2749

    
    

    
                        table->Columns[column_n].SortOrder = -1;

    


    

    
2750

    
    

    
                break;

    


    

    
2751

    
    

    
            }

    


    

    
2752

    
    

    
        }

    


    

    
2753

    
    

    
    }

    


    

    
2754

    
    

    

    


    

    
2755

    
    

    
    // Fallback default sort order (if no column had the ImGuiTableColumnFlags_DefaultSort flag)

    


    

    
2756

    
    

    
    if (sort_order_count == 0 && !(table->Flags & ImGuiTableFlags_SortTristate))

    


    

    
2757

    
    

    
        for (int column_n = 0; column_n < table->ColumnsCount; column_n++)

    


    

    
2758

    
    

    
        {

    


    

    
2759

    
    

    
            ImGuiTableColumn* column = &table->Columns[column_n];

    


    

    
2760

    
    

    
            if (column->IsEnabled && !(column->Flags & ImGuiTableColumnFlags_NoSort))

    


    

    
2761

    
    

    
            {

    


    

    
2762

    
    

    
                sort_order_count = 1;

    


    

    
2763

    
    

    
                column->SortOrder = 0;

    


    

    
2764

    
    

    
                column->SortDirection = (ImU8)TableGetColumnAvailSortDirection(column, 0);

    


    

    
2765

    
    

    
                break;

    


    

    
2766

    
    

    
            }

    


    

    
2767

    
    

    
        }

    


    

    
2768

    
    

    

    


    

    
2769

    
    

    
    table->SortSpecsCount = (ImGuiTableColumnIdx)sort_order_count;

    


    

    
2770

    
    

    
}

    


    

    
2771

    
    

    

    


    

    
2772

    
    

    
void ImGui::TableSortSpecsBuild(ImGuiTable* table)

    


    

    
2773

    
    

    
{

    


    

    
2774

    
    

    
    bool dirty = table->IsSortSpecsDirty;

    


    

    
2775

    
    

    
    if (dirty)

    


    

    
2776

    
    

    
    {

    


    

    
2777

    
    

    
        TableSortSpecsSanitize(table);

    


    

    
2778

    
    

    
        table->SortSpecsMulti.resize(table->SortSpecsCount <= 1 ? 0 : table->SortSpecsCount);

    


    

    
2779

    
    

    
        table->SortSpecs.SpecsDirty = true; // Mark as dirty for user

    


    

    
2780

    
    

    
        table->IsSortSpecsDirty = false; // Mark as not dirty for us

    


    

    
2781

    
    

    
    }

    


    

    
2782

    
    

    

    


    

    
2783

    
    

    
    // Write output

    


    

    
2784

    
    

    
    ImGuiTableColumnSortSpecs* sort_specs = (table->SortSpecsCount == 0) ? NULL : (table->SortSpecsCount == 1) ? &table->SortSpecsSingle : table->SortSpecsMulti.Data;

    


    

    
2785

    
    

    
    if (dirty && sort_specs != NULL)

    


    

    
2786

    
    

    
        for (int column_n = 0; column_n < table->ColumnsCount; column_n++)

    


    

    
2787

    
    

    
        {

    


    

    
2788

    
    

    
            ImGuiTableColumn* column = &table->Columns[column_n];

    


    

    
2789

    
    

    
            if (column->SortOrder == -1)

    


    

    
2790

    
    

    
                continue;

    


    

    
2791

    
    

    
            IM_ASSERT(column->SortOrder < table->SortSpecsCount);

    


    

    
2792

    
    

    
            ImGuiTableColumnSortSpecs* sort_spec = &sort_specs[column->SortOrder];

    


    

    
2793

    
    

    
            sort_spec->ColumnUserID = column->UserID;

    


    

    
2794

    
    

    
            sort_spec->ColumnIndex = (ImGuiTableColumnIdx)column_n;

    


    

    
2795

    
    

    
            sort_spec->SortOrder = (ImGuiTableColumnIdx)column->SortOrder;

    


    

    
2796

    
    

    
            sort_spec->SortDirection = column->SortDirection;

    


    

    
2797

    
    

    
        }

    


    

    
2798

    
    

    

    


    

    
2799

    
    

    
    table->SortSpecs.Specs = sort_specs;

    


    

    
2800

    
    

    
    table->SortSpecs.SpecsCount = table->SortSpecsCount;

    


    

    
2801

    
    

    
}

    


    

    
2802

    
    

    

    


    

    
2803

    
    

    
//-------------------------------------------------------------------------

    


    

    
2804

    
    

    
// [SECTION] Tables: Headers

    


    

    
2805

    
    

    
//-------------------------------------------------------------------------

    


    

    
2806

    
    

    
// - TableGetHeaderRowHeight() [Internal]

    


    

    
2807

    
    

    
// - TableHeadersRow()

    


    

    
2808

    
    

    
// - TableHeader()

    


    

    
2809

    
    

    
//-------------------------------------------------------------------------

    


    

    
2810

    
    

    

    


    

    
2811

    
    

    
float ImGui::TableGetHeaderRowHeight()

    


    

    
2812

    
    

    
{

    


    

    
2813

    
    

    
    // Caring for a minor edge case:

    


    

    
2814

    
    

    
    // Calculate row height, for the unlikely case that some labels may be taller than others.

    


    

    
2815

    
    

    
    // If we didn't do that, uneven header height would highlight but smaller one before the tallest wouldn't catch input for all height.

    


    

    
2816

    
    

    
    // In your custom header row you may omit this all together and just call TableNextRow() without a height...

    


    

    
2817

    
    

    
    float row_height = GetTextLineHeight();

    


    

    
2818

    
    

    
    int columns_count = TableGetColumnCount();

    


    

    
2819

    
    

    
    for (int column_n = 0; column_n < columns_count; column_n++)

    


    

    
2820

    
    

    
    {

    


    

    
2821

    
    

    
        ImGuiTableColumnFlags flags = TableGetColumnFlags(column_n);

    


    

    
2822

    
    

    
        if ((flags & ImGuiTableColumnFlags_IsEnabled) && !(flags & ImGuiTableColumnFlags_NoHeaderLabel))

    


    

    
2823

    
    

    
            row_height = ImMax(row_height, CalcTextSize(TableGetColumnName(column_n)).y);

    


    

    
2824

    
    

    
    }

    


    

    
2825

    
    

    
    row_height += GetStyle().CellPadding.y * 2.0f;

    


    

    
2826

    
    

    
    return row_height;

    


    

    
2827

    
    

    
}

    


    

    
2828

    
    

    

    


    

    
2829

    
    

    
// [Public] This is a helper to output TableHeader() calls based on the column names declared in TableSetupColumn().

    


    

    
2830

    
    

    
// The intent is that advanced users willing to create customized headers would not need to use this helper

    


    

    
2831

    
    

    
// and can create their own! For example: TableHeader() may be preceeded by Checkbox() or other custom widgets.

    


    

    
2832

    
    

    
// See 'Demo->Tables->Custom headers' for a demonstration of implementing a custom version of this.

    


    

    
2833

    
    

    
// This code is constructed to not make much use of internal functions, as it is intended to be a template to copy.

    


    

    
2834

    
    

    
// FIXME-TABLE: TableOpenContextMenu() and TableGetHeaderRowHeight() are not public.

    


    

    
2835

    
    

    
void ImGui::TableHeadersRow()

    


    

    
2836

    
    

    
{

    


    

    
2837

    
    

    
    ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;

    


    

    
2838

    
    

    
    ImGuiTable* table = g.CurrentTable;

    


    

    
2839

    
    

    
    IM_ASSERT(table != NULL && "Need to call TableHeadersRow() after BeginTable()!");

    


    

    
2840

    
    

    

    


    

    
2841

    
    

    
    // Layout if not already done (this is automatically done by TableNextRow, we do it here solely to facilitate stepping in debugger as it is frequent to step in TableUpdateLayout)

    


    

    
2842

    
    

    
    if (!table->IsLayoutLocked)

    


    

    
2843

    
    

    
        TableUpdateLayout(table);

    


    

    
2844

    
    

    

    


    

    
2845

    
    

    
    // Open row

    


    

    
2846

    
    

    
    const float row_y1 = GetCursorScreenPos().y;

    


    

    
2847

    
    

    
    const float row_height = TableGetHeaderRowHeight();

    


    

    
2848

    
    

    
    TableNextRow(ImGuiTableRowFlags_Headers, row_height);

    


    

    
2849

    
    

    
    if (table->HostSkipItems) // Merely an optimization, you may skip in your own code.

    


    

    
2850

    
    

    
        return;

    


    

    
2851

    
    

    

    


    

    
2852

    
    

    
    const int columns_count = TableGetColumnCount();

    


    

    
2853

    
    

    
    for (int column_n = 0; column_n < columns_count; column_n++)

    


    

    
2854

    
    

    
    {

    


    

    
2855

    
    

    
        if (!TableSetColumnIndex(column_n))

    


    

    
2856

    
    

    
            continue;

    


    

    
2857

    
    

    

    


    

    
2858

    
    

    
        // Push an id to allow unnamed labels (generally accidental, but let's behave nicely with them)

    


    

    
2859

    
    

    
        // - in your own code you may omit the PushID/PopID all-together, provided you know they won't collide

    


    

    
2860

    
    

    
        // - table->InstanceCurrent is only >0 when we use multiple BeginTable/EndTable calls with same identifier.

    


    

    
2861

    
    

    
        const char* name = (TableGetColumnFlags(column_n) & ImGuiTableColumnFlags_NoHeaderLabel) ? "" : TableGetColumnName(column_n);

    


    

    
2862

    
    

    
        PushID(table->InstanceCurrent * table->ColumnsCount + column_n);

    


    

    
2863

    
    

    
        TableHeader(name);

    


    

    
2864

    
    

    
        PopID();

    


    

    
2865

    
    

    
    }

    


    

    
2866

    
    

    

    


    

    
2867

    
    

    
    // Allow opening popup from the right-most section after the last column.

    


    

    
2868

    
    

    
    ImVec2 mouse_pos = ImGui::GetMousePos();

    


    

    
2869

    
    

    
    if (IsMouseReleased(1) && TableGetHoveredColumn() == columns_count)

    


    

    
2870

    
    

    
        if (mouse_pos.y >= row_y1 && mouse_pos.y < row_y1 + row_height)

    


    

    
2871

    
    

    
            TableOpenContextMenu(-1); // Will open a non-column-specific popup.

    


    

    
2872

    
    

    
}

    


    

    
2873

    
    

    

    


    

    
2874

    
    

    
// Emit a column header (text + optional sort order)

    


    

    
2875

    
    

    
// We cpu-clip text here so that all columns headers can be merged into a same draw call.

    


    

    
2876

    
    

    
// Note that because of how we cpu-clip and display sorting indicators, you _cannot_ use SameLine() after a TableHeader()

    


    

    
2877

    
    

    
void ImGui::TableHeader(const char* label)

    


    

    
2878

    
    

    
{

    


    

    
2879

    
    

    
    ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;

    


    

    
2880

    
    

    
    ImGuiWindow* window = g.CurrentWindow;

    


    

    
2881

    
    

    
    if (window->SkipItems)

    


    

    
2882

    
    

    
        return;

    


    

    
2883

    
    

    

    


    

    
2884

    
    

    
    ImGuiTable* table = g.CurrentTable;

    


    

    
2885

    
    

    
    IM_ASSERT(table != NULL && "Need to call TableHeader() after BeginTable()!");

    


    

    
2886

    
    

    
    IM_ASSERT(table->CurrentColumn != -1);

    


    

    
2887

    
    

    
    const int column_n = table->CurrentColumn;

    


    

    
2888

    
    

    
    ImGuiTableColumn* column = &table->Columns[column_n];

    


    

    
2889

    
    

    

    


    

    
2890

    
    

    
    // Label

    


    

    
2891

    
    

    
    if (label == NULL)

    


    

    
2892

    
    

    
        label = "";

    


    

    
2893

    
    

    
    const char* label_end = FindRenderedTextEnd(label);

    


    

    
2894

    
    

    
    ImVec2 label_size = CalcTextSize(label, label_end, true);

    


    

    
2895

    
    

    
    ImVec2 label_pos = window->DC.CursorPos;

    


    

    
2896

    
    

    

    


    

    
2897

    
    

    
    // If we already got a row height, there's use that.

    


    

    
2898

    
    

    
    // FIXME-TABLE: Padding problem if the correct outer-padding CellBgRect strays off our ClipRect?

    


    

    
2899

    
    

    
    ImRect cell_r = TableGetCellBgRect(table, column_n);

    


    

    
2900

    
    

    
    float label_height = ImMax(label_size.y, table->RowMinHeight - table->CellPaddingY * 2.0f);

    


    

    
2901

    
    

    

    


    

    
2902

    
    

    
    // Calculate ideal size for sort order arrow

    


    

    
2903

    
    

    
    float w_arrow = 0.0f;

    


    

    
2904

    
    

    
    float w_sort_text = 0.0f;

    


    

    
2905

    
    

    
    char sort_order_suf[4] = "";

    


    

    
2906

    
    

    
    const float ARROW_SCALE = 0.65f;

    


    

    
2907

    
    

    
    if ((table->Flags & ImGuiTableFlags_Sortable) && !(column->Flags & ImGuiTableColumnFlags_NoSort))

    


    

    
2908

    
    

    
    {

    


    

    
2909

    
    

    
        w_arrow = ImFloor(g.FontSize * ARROW_SCALE + g.Style.FramePadding.x);

    


    

    
2910

    
    

    
        if (column->SortOrder > 0)

    


    

    
2911

    
    

    
        {

    


    

    
2912

    
    

    
            ImFormatString(sort_order_suf, IM_ARRAYSIZE(sort_order_suf), "%d", column->SortOrder + 1);

    


    

    
2913

    
    

    
            w_sort_text = g.Style.ItemInnerSpacing.x + CalcTextSize(sort_order_suf).x;

    


    

    
2914

    
    

    
        }

    


    

    
2915

    
    

    
    }

    


    

    
2916

    
    

    

    


    

    
2917

    
    

    
    // We feed our unclipped width to the column without writing on CursorMaxPos, so that column is still considering for merging.

    


    

    
2918

    
    

    
    float max_pos_x = label_pos.x + label_size.x + w_sort_text + w_arrow;

    


    

    
2919

    
    

    
    column->ContentMaxXHeadersUsed = ImMax(column->ContentMaxXHeadersUsed, column->WorkMaxX);

    


    

    
2920

    
    

    
    column->ContentMaxXHeadersIdeal = ImMax(column->ContentMaxXHeadersIdeal, max_pos_x);

    


    

    
2921

    
    

    

    


    

    
2922

    
    

    
    // Keep header highlighted when context menu is open.

    


    

    
2923

    
    

    
    const bool selected = (table->IsContextPopupOpen && table->ContextPopupColumn == column_n && table->InstanceInteracted == table->InstanceCurrent);

    


    

    
2924

    
    

    
    ImGuiID id = window->GetID(label);

    


    

    
2925

    
    

    
    ImRect bb(cell_r.Min.x, cell_r.Min.y, cell_r.Max.x, ImMax(cell_r.Max.y, cell_r.Min.y + label_height + g.Style.CellPadding.y * 2.0f));

    


    

    
2926

    
    

    
    ItemSize(ImVec2(0.0f, label_height)); // Don't declare unclipped width, it'll be fed ContentMaxPosHeadersIdeal

    


    

    
2927

    
    

    
    if (!ItemAdd(bb, id))

    


    

    
2928

    
    

    
        return;

    


    

    
2929

    
    

    

    


    

    
2930

    
    

    
    //GetForegroundDrawList()->AddRect(cell_r.Min, cell_r.Max, IM_COL32(255, 0, 0, 255)); // [DEBUG]

    


    

    
2931

    
    

    
    //GetForegroundDrawList()->AddRect(bb.Min, bb.Max, IM_COL32(255, 0, 0, 255)); // [DEBUG]

    


    

    
2932

    
    

    

    


    

    
2933

    
    

    
    // Using AllowItemOverlap mode because we cover the whole cell, and we want user to be able to submit subsequent items.

    


    

    
2934

    
    

    
    bool hovered, held;

    


    

    
2935

    
    

    
    bool pressed = ButtonBehavior(bb, id, &hovered, &held, ImGuiButtonFlags_AllowItemOverlap);

    


    

    
2936

    
    

    
    if (g.ActiveId != id)

    


    

    
2937

    
    

    
        SetItemAllowOverlap();

    


    

    
2938

    
    

    
    if (held || hovered || selected)

    


    

    
2939

    
    

    
    {

    


    

    
2940

    
    

    
        const ImU32 col = GetColorU32(held ? ImGuiCol_HeaderActive : hovered ? ImGuiCol_HeaderHovered : ImGuiCol_Header);

    


    

    
2941

    
    

    
        //RenderFrame(bb.Min, bb.Max, col, false, 0.0f);

    


    

    
2942

    
    

    
        TableSetBgColor(ImGuiTableBgTarget_CellBg, col, table->CurrentColumn);

    


    

    
2943

    
    

    
    }

    


    

    
2944

    
    

    
    else

    


    

    
2945

    
    

    
    {

    


    

    
2946

    
    

    
        // Submit single cell bg color in the case we didn't submit a full header row

    


    

    
2947

    
    

    
        if ((table->RowFlags & ImGuiTableRowFlags_Headers) == 0)

    


    

    
2948

    
    

    
            TableSetBgColor(ImGuiTableBgTarget_CellBg, GetColorU32(ImGuiCol_TableHeaderBg), table->CurrentColumn);

    


    

    
2949

    
    

    
    }

    


    

    
2950

    
    

    
    RenderNavHighlight(bb, id, ImGuiNavHighlightFlags_TypeThin | ImGuiNavHighlightFlags_NoRounding);

    


    

    
2951

    
    

    
    if (held)

    


    

    
2952

    
    

    
        table->HeldHeaderColumn = (ImGuiTableColumnIdx)column_n;

    


    

    
2953

    
    

    
    window->DC.CursorPos.y -= g.Style.ItemSpacing.y * 0.5f;

    


    

    
2954

    
    

    

    


    

    
2955

    
    

    
    // Drag and drop to re-order columns.

    


    

    
2956

    
    

    
    // FIXME-TABLE: Scroll request while reordering a column and it lands out of the scrolling zone.

    


    

    
2957

    
    

    
    if (held && (table->Flags & ImGuiTableFlags_Reorderable) && IsMouseDragging(0) && !g.DragDropActive)

    


    

    
2958

    
    

    
    {

    


    

    
2959

    
    

    
        // While moving a column it will jump on the other side of the mouse, so we also test for MouseDelta.x

    


    

    
2960

    
    

    
        table->ReorderColumn = (ImGuiTableColumnIdx)column_n;

    


    

    
2961

    
    

    
        table->InstanceInteracted = table->InstanceCurrent;

    


    

    
2962

    
    

    

    


    

    
2963

    
    

    
        // We don't reorder: through the frozen<>unfrozen line, or through a column that is marked with ImGuiTableColumnFlags_NoReorder.

    


    

    
2964

    
    

    
        if (g.IO.MouseDelta.x < 0.0f && g.IO.MousePos.x < cell_r.Min.x)

    


    

    
2965

    
    

    
            if (ImGuiTableColumn* prev_column = (column->PrevEnabledColumn != -1) ? &table->Columns[column->PrevEnabledColumn] : NULL)

    


    

    
2966

    
    

    
                if (!((column->Flags | prev_column->Flags) & ImGuiTableColumnFlags_NoReorder))

    


    

    
2967

    
    

    
                    if ((column->IndexWithinEnabledSet < table->FreezeColumnsRequest) == (prev_column->IndexWithinEnabledSet < table->FreezeColumnsRequest))

    


    

    
2968

    
    

    
                        table->ReorderColumnDir = -1;

    


    

    
2969

    
    

    
        if (g.IO.MouseDelta.x > 0.0f && g.IO.MousePos.x > cell_r.Max.x)

    


    

    
2970

    
    

    
            if (ImGuiTableColumn* next_column = (column->NextEnabledColumn != -1) ? &table->Columns[column->NextEnabledColumn] : NULL)

    


    

    
2971

    
    

    
                if (!((column->Flags | next_column->Flags) & ImGuiTableColumnFlags_NoReorder))

    


    

    
2972

    
    

    
                    if ((column->IndexWithinEnabledSet < table->FreezeColumnsRequest) == (next_column->IndexWithinEnabledSet < table->FreezeColumnsRequest))

    


    

    
2973

    
    

    
                        table->ReorderColumnDir = +1;

    


    

    
2974

    
    

    
    }

    


    

    
2975

    
    

    

    


    

    
2976

    
    

    
    // Sort order arrow

    


    

    
2977

    
    

    
    const float ellipsis_max = cell_r.Max.x - w_arrow - w_sort_text;

    


    

    
2978

    
    

    
    if ((table->Flags & ImGuiTableFlags_Sortable) && !(column->Flags & ImGuiTableColumnFlags_NoSort))

    


    

    
2979

    
    

    
    {

    


    

    
2980

    
    

    
        if (column->SortOrder != -1)

    


    

    
2981

    
    

    
        {

    


    

    
2982

    
    

    
            float x = ImMax(cell_r.Min.x, cell_r.Max.x - w_arrow - w_sort_text);

    


    

    
2983

    
    

    
            float y = label_pos.y;

    


    

    
2984

    
    

    
            if (column->SortOrder > 0)

    


    

    
2985

    
    

    
            {

    


    

    
2986

    
    

    
                PushStyleColor(ImGuiCol_Text, GetColorU32(ImGuiCol_Text, 0.70f));

    


    

    
2987

    
    

    
                RenderText(ImVec2(x + g.Style.ItemInnerSpacing.x, y), sort_order_suf);

    


    

    
2988

    
    

    
                PopStyleColor();

    


    

    
2989

    
    

    
                x += w_sort_text;

    


    

    
2990

    
    

    
            }

    


    

    
2991

    
    

    
            RenderArrow(window->DrawList, ImVec2(x, y), GetColorU32(ImGuiCol_Text), column->SortDirection == ImGuiSortDirection_Ascending ? ImGuiDir_Up : ImGuiDir_Down, ARROW_SCALE);

    


    

    
2992

    
    

    
        }

    


    

    
2993

    
    

    

    


    

    
2994

    
    

    
        // Handle clicking on column header to adjust Sort Order

    


    

    
2995

    
    

    
        if (pressed && table->ReorderColumn != column_n)

    


    

    
2996

    
    

    
        {

    


    

    
2997

    
    

    
            ImGuiSortDirection sort_direction = TableGetColumnNextSortDirection(column);

    


    

    
2998

    
    

    
            TableSetColumnSortDirection(column_n, sort_direction, g.IO.KeyShift);

    


    

    
2999

    
    

    
        }

    


    

    
3000

    
    

    
    }

    


    

    
3001

    
    

    

    


    

    
3002

    
    

    
    // Render clipped label. Clipping here ensure that in the majority of situations, all our header cells will

    


    

    
3003

    
    

    
    // be merged into a single draw call.

    


    

    
3004

    
    

    
    //window->DrawList->AddCircleFilled(ImVec2(ellipsis_max, label_pos.y), 40, IM_COL32_WHITE);

    


    

    
3005

    
    

    
    RenderTextEllipsis(window->DrawList, label_pos, ImVec2(ellipsis_max, label_pos.y + label_height + g.Style.FramePadding.y), ellipsis_max, ellipsis_max, label, label_end, &label_size);

    


    

    
3006

    
    

    

    


    

    
3007

    
    

    
    const bool text_clipped = label_size.x > (ellipsis_max - label_pos.x);

    


    

    
3008

    
    

    
    if (text_clipped && hovered && g.ActiveId == 0 && IsItemHovered(ImGuiHoveredFlags_DelayNormal))

    


    

    
3009

    
    

    
        SetTooltip("%.*s", (int)(label_end - label), label);

    


    

    
3010

    
    

    

    


    

    
3011

    
    

    
    // We don't use BeginPopupContextItem() because we want the popup to stay up even after the column is hidden

    


    

    
3012

    
    

    
    if (IsMouseReleased(1) && IsItemHovered())

    


    

    
3013

    
    

    
        TableOpenContextMenu(column_n);

    


    

    
3014

    
    

    
}

    


    

    
3015

    
    

    

    


    

    
3016

    
    

    
//-------------------------------------------------------------------------

    


    

    
3017

    
    

    
// [SECTION] Tables: Context Menu

    


    

    
3018

    
    

    
//-------------------------------------------------------------------------

    


    

    
3019

    
    

    
// - TableOpenContextMenu() [Internal]

    


    

    
3020

    
    

    
// - TableDrawContextMenu() [Internal]

    


    

    
3021

    
    

    
//-------------------------------------------------------------------------

    


    

    
3022

    
    

    

    


    

    
3023

    
    

    
// Use -1 to open menu not specific to a given column.

    


    

    
3024

    
    

    
void ImGui::TableOpenContextMenu(int column_n)

    


    

    
3025

    
    

    
{

    


    

    
3026

    
    

    
    ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;

    


    

    
3027

    
    

    
    ImGuiTable* table = g.CurrentTable;

    


    

    
3028

    
    

    
    if (column_n == -1 && table->CurrentColumn != -1)   // When called within a column automatically use this one (for consistency)

    


    

    
3029

    
    

    
        column_n = table->CurrentColumn;

    


    

    
3030

    
    

    
    if (column_n == table->ColumnsCount)                // To facilitate using with TableGetHoveredColumn()

    


    

    
3031

    
    

    
        column_n = -1;

    


    

    
3032

    
    

    
    IM_ASSERT(column_n >= -1 && column_n < table->ColumnsCount);

    


    

    
3033

    
    

    
    if (table->Flags & (ImGuiTableFlags_Resizable | ImGuiTableFlags_Reorderable | ImGuiTableFlags_Hideable))

    


    

    
3034

    
    

    
    {

    


    

    
3035

    
    

    
        table->IsContextPopupOpen = true;

    


    

    
3036

    
    

    
        table->ContextPopupColumn = (ImGuiTableColumnIdx)column_n;

    


    

    
3037

    
    

    
        table->InstanceInteracted = table->InstanceCurrent;

    


    

    
3038

    
    

    
        const ImGuiID context_menu_id = ImHashStr("##ContextMenu", 0, table->ID);

    


    

    
3039

    
    

    
        OpenPopupEx(context_menu_id, ImGuiPopupFlags_None);

    


    

    
3040

    
    

    
    }

    


    

    
3041

    
    

    
}

    


    

    
3042

    
    

    

    


    

    
3043

    
    

    
bool ImGui::TableBeginContextMenuPopup(ImGuiTable* table)

    


    

    
3044

    
    

    
{

    


    

    
3045

    
    

    
    if (!table->IsContextPopupOpen || table->InstanceCurrent != table->InstanceInteracted)

    


    

    
3046

    
    

    
        return false;

    


    

    
3047

    
    

    
    const ImGuiID context_menu_id = ImHashStr("##ContextMenu", 0, table->ID);

    


    

    
3048

    
    

    
    if (BeginPopupEx(context_menu_id, ImGuiWindowFlags_AlwaysAutoResize | ImGuiWindowFlags_NoTitleBar | ImGuiWindowFlags_NoSavedSettings))

    


    

    
3049

    
    

    
        return true;

    


    

    
3050

    
    

    
    table->IsContextPopupOpen = false;

    


    

    
3051

    
    

    
    return false;

    


    

    
3052

    
    

    
}

    


    

    
3053

    
    

    

    


    

    
3054

    
    

    
// Output context menu into current window (generally a popup)

    


    

    
3055

    
    

    
// FIXME-TABLE: Ideally this should be writable by the user. Full programmatic access to that data?

    


    

    
3056

    
    

    
void ImGui::TableDrawContextMenu(ImGuiTable* table)

    


    

    
3057

    
    

    
{

    


    

    
3058

    
    

    
    ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;

    


    

    
3059

    
    

    
    ImGuiWindow* window = g.CurrentWindow;

    


    

    
3060

    
    

    
    if (window->SkipItems)

    


    

    
3061

    
    

    
        return;

    


    

    
3062

    
    

    

    


    

    
3063

    
    

    
    bool want_separator = false;

    


    

    
3064

    
    

    
    const int column_n = (table->ContextPopupColumn >= 0 && table->ContextPopupColumn < table->ColumnsCount) ? table->ContextPopupColumn : -1;

    


    

    
3065

    
    

    
    ImGuiTableColumn* column = (column_n != -1) ? &table->Columns[column_n] : NULL;

    


    

    
3066

    
    

    

    


    

    
3067

    
    

    
    // Sizing

    


    

    
3068

    
    

    
    if (table->Flags & ImGuiTableFlags_Resizable)

    


    

    
3069

    
    

    
    {

    


    

    
3070

    
    

    
        if (column != NULL)

    


    

    
3071

    
    

    
        {

    


    

    
3072

    
    

    
            const bool can_resize = !(column->Flags & ImGuiTableColumnFlags_NoResize) && column->IsEnabled;

    


    

    
3073

    
    

    
            if (MenuItem("Size column to fit###SizeOne", NULL, false, can_resize))

    


    

    
3074

    
    

    
                TableSetColumnWidthAutoSingle(table, column_n);

    


    

    
3075

    
    

    
        }

    


    

    
3076

    
    

    

    


    

    
3077

    
    

    
        const char* size_all_desc;

    


    

    
3078

    
    

    
        if (table->ColumnsEnabledFixedCount == table->ColumnsEnabledCount && (table->Flags & ImGuiTableFlags_SizingMask_) != ImGuiTableFlags_SizingFixedSame)

    


    

    
3079

    
    

    
            size_all_desc = "Size all columns to fit###SizeAll";        // All fixed

    


    

    
3080

    
    

    
        else

    


    

    
3081

    
    

    
            size_all_desc = "Size all columns to default###SizeAll";    // All stretch or mixed

    


    

    
3082

    
    

    
        if (MenuItem(size_all_desc, NULL))

    


    

    
3083

    
    

    
            TableSetColumnWidthAutoAll(table);

    


    

    
3084

    
    

    
        want_separator = true;

    


    

    
3085

    
    

    
    }

    


    

    
3086

    
    

    

    


    

    
3087

    
    

    
    // Ordering

    


    

    
3088

    
    

    
    if (table->Flags & ImGuiTableFlags_Reorderable)

    


    

    
3089

    
    

    
    {

    


    

    
3090

    
    

    
        if (MenuItem("Reset order", NULL, false, !table->IsDefaultDisplayOrder))

    


    

    
3091

    
    

    
            table->IsResetDisplayOrderRequest = true;

    


    

    
3092

    
    

    
        want_separator = true;

    


    

    
3093

    
    

    
    }

    


    

    
3094

    
    

    

    


    

    
3095

    
    

    
    // Reset all (should work but seems unnecessary/noisy to expose?)

    


    

    
3096

    
    

    
    //if (MenuItem("Reset all"))

    


    

    
3097

    
    

    
    //    table->IsResetAllRequest = true;

    


    

    
3098

    
    

    

    


    

    
3099

    
    

    
    // Sorting

    


    

    
3100

    
    

    
    // (modify TableOpenContextMenu() to add _Sortable flag if enabling this)

    


    

    
3101

    
    

    
#if 0

    


    

    
3102

    
    

    
    if ((table->Flags & ImGuiTableFlags_Sortable) && column != NULL && (column->Flags & ImGuiTableColumnFlags_NoSort) == 0)

    


    

    
3103

    
    

    
    {

    


    

    
3104

    
    

    
        if (want_separator)

    


    

    
3105

    
    

    
            Separator();

    


    

    
3106

    
    

    
        want_separator = true;

    


    

    
3107

    
    

    

    


    

    
3108

    
    

    
        bool append_to_sort_specs = g.IO.KeyShift;

    


    

    
3109

    
    

    
        if (MenuItem("Sort in Ascending Order", NULL, column->SortOrder != -1 && column->SortDirection == ImGuiSortDirection_Ascending, (column->Flags & ImGuiTableColumnFlags_NoSortAscending) == 0))

    


    

    
3110

    
    

    
            TableSetColumnSortDirection(table, column_n, ImGuiSortDirection_Ascending, append_to_sort_specs);

    


    

    
3111

    
    

    
        if (MenuItem("Sort in Descending Order", NULL, column->SortOrder != -1 && column->SortDirection == ImGuiSortDirection_Descending, (column->Flags & ImGuiTableColumnFlags_NoSortDescending) == 0))

    


    

    
3112

    
    

    
            TableSetColumnSortDirection(table, column_n, ImGuiSortDirection_Descending, append_to_sort_specs);

    


    

    
3113

    
    

    
    }

    


    

    
3114

    
    

    
#endif

    


    

    
3115

    
    

    

    


    

    
3116

    
    

    
    // Hiding / Visibility

    


    

    
3117

    
    

    
    if (table->Flags & ImGuiTableFlags_Hideable)

    


    

    
3118

    
    

    
    {

    


    

    
3119

    
    

    
        if (want_separator)

    


    

    
3120

    
    

    
            Separator();

    


    

    
3121

    
    

    
        want_separator = true;

    


    

    
3122

    
    

    

    


    

    
3123

    
    

    
        PushItemFlag(ImGuiItemFlags_SelectableDontClosePopup, true);

    


    

    
3124

    
    

    
        for (int other_column_n = 0; other_column_n < table->ColumnsCount; other_column_n++)

    


    

    
3125

    
    

    
        {

    


    

    
3126

    
    

    
            ImGuiTableColumn* other_column = &table->Columns[other_column_n];

    


    

    
3127

    
    

    
            if (other_column->Flags & ImGuiTableColumnFlags_Disabled)

    


    

    
3128

    
    

    
                continue;

    


    

    
3129

    
    

    

    


    

    
3130

    
    

    
            const char* name = TableGetColumnName(table, other_column_n);

    


    

    
3131

    
    

    
            if (name == NULL || name[0] == 0)

    


    

    
3132

    
    

    
                name = "<Unknown>";

    


    

    
3133

    
    

    

    


    

    
3134

    
    

    
            // Make sure we can't hide the last active column

    


    

    
3135

    
    

    
            bool menu_item_active = (other_column->Flags & ImGuiTableColumnFlags_NoHide) ? false : true;

    


    

    
3136

    
    

    
            if (other_column->IsUserEnabled && table->ColumnsEnabledCount <= 1)

    


    

    
3137

    
    

    
                menu_item_active = false;

    


    

    
3138

    
    

    
            if (MenuItem(name, NULL, other_column->IsUserEnabled, menu_item_active))

    


    

    
3139

    
    

    
                other_column->IsUserEnabledNextFrame = !other_column->IsUserEnabled;

    


    

    
3140

    
    

    
        }

    


    

    
3141

    
    

    
        PopItemFlag();

    


    

    
3142

    
    

    
    }

    


    

    
3143

    
    

    
}

    


    

    
3144

    
    

    

    


    

    
3145

    
    

    
//-------------------------------------------------------------------------

    


    

    
3146

    
    

    
// [SECTION] Tables: Settings (.ini data)

    


    

    
3147

    
    

    
//-------------------------------------------------------------------------

    


    

    
3148

    
    

    
// FIXME: The binding/finding/creating flow are too confusing.

    


    

    
3149

    
    

    
//-------------------------------------------------------------------------

    


    

    
3150

    
    

    
// - TableSettingsInit() [Internal]

    


    

    
3151

    
    

    
// - TableSettingsCalcChunkSize() [Internal]

    


    

    
3152

    
    

    
// - TableSettingsCreate() [Internal]

    


    

    
3153

    
    

    
// - TableSettingsFindByID() [Internal]

    


    

    
3154

    
    

    
// - TableGetBoundSettings() [Internal]

    


    

    
3155

    
    

    
// - TableResetSettings()

    


    

    
3156

    
    

    
// - TableSaveSettings() [Internal]

    


    

    
3157

    
    

    
// - TableLoadSettings() [Internal]

    


    

    
3158

    
    

    
// - TableSettingsHandler_ClearAll() [Internal]

    


    

    
3159

    
    

    
// - TableSettingsHandler_ApplyAll() [Internal]

    


    

    
3160

    
    

    
// - TableSettingsHandler_ReadOpen() [Internal]

    


    

    
3161

    
    

    
// - TableSettingsHandler_ReadLine() [Internal]

    


    

    
3162

    
    

    
// - TableSettingsHandler_WriteAll() [Internal]

    


    

    
3163

    
    

    
// - TableSettingsInstallHandler() [Internal]

    


    

    
3164

    
    

    
//-------------------------------------------------------------------------

    


    

    
3165

    
    

    
// [Init] 1: TableSettingsHandler_ReadXXXX()   Load and parse .ini file into TableSettings.

    


    

    
3166

    
    

    
// [Main] 2: TableLoadSettings()               When table is created, bind Table to TableSettings, serialize TableSettings data into Table.

    


    

    
3167

    
    

    
// [Main] 3: TableSaveSettings()               When table properties are modified, serialize Table data into bound or new TableSettings, mark .ini as dirty.

    


    

    
3168

    
    

    
// [Main] 4: TableSettingsHandler_WriteAll()   When .ini file is dirty (which can come from other source), save TableSettings into .ini file.

    


    

    
3169

    
    

    
//-------------------------------------------------------------------------

    


    

    
3170

    
    

    

    


    

    
3171

    
    

    
// Clear and initialize empty settings instance

    


    

    
3172

    
    

    
static void TableSettingsInit(ImGuiTableSettings* settings, ImGuiID id, int columns_count, int columns_count_max)

    


    

    
3173

    
    

    
{

    


    

    
3174

    
    

    
    IM_PLACEMENT_NEW(settings) ImGuiTableSettings();

    


    

    
3175

    
    

    
    ImGuiTableColumnSettings* settings_column = settings->GetColumnSettings();

    


    

    
3176

    
    

    
    for (int n = 0; n < columns_count_max; n++, settings_column++)

    


    

    
3177

    
    

    
        IM_PLACEMENT_NEW(settings_column) ImGuiTableColumnSettings();

    


    

    
3178

    
    

    
    settings->ID = id;

    


    

    
3179

    
    

    
    settings->ColumnsCount = (ImGuiTableColumnIdx)columns_count;

    


    

    
3180

    
    

    
    settings->ColumnsCountMax = (ImGuiTableColumnIdx)columns_count_max;

    


    

    
3181

    
    

    
    settings->WantApply = true;

    


    

    
3182

    
    

    
}

    


    

    
3183

    
    

    

    


    

    
3184

    
    

    
static size_t TableSettingsCalcChunkSize(int columns_count)

    


    

    
3185

    
    

    
{

    


    

    
3186

    
    

    
    return sizeof(ImGuiTableSettings) + (size_t)columns_count * sizeof(ImGuiTableColumnSettings);

    


    

    
3187

    
    

    
}

    


    

    
3188

    
    

    

    


    

    
3189

    
    

    
ImGuiTableSettings* ImGui::TableSettingsCreate(ImGuiID id, int columns_count)

    


    

    
3190

    
    

    
{

    


    

    
3191

    
    

    
    ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;

    


    

    
3192

    
    

    
    ImGuiTableSettings* settings = g.SettingsTables.alloc_chunk(TableSettingsCalcChunkSize(columns_count));

    


    

    
3193

    
    

    
    TableSettingsInit(settings, id, columns_count, columns_count);

    


    

    
3194

    
    

    
    return settings;

    


    

    
3195

    
    

    
}

    


    

    
3196

    
    

    

    


    

    
3197

    
    

    
// Find existing settings

    


    

    
3198

    
    

    
ImGuiTableSettings* ImGui::TableSettingsFindByID(ImGuiID id)

    


    

    
3199

    
    

    
{

    


    

    
3200

    
    

    
    // FIXME-OPT: Might want to store a lookup map for this?

    


    

    
3201

    
    

    
    ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;

    


    

    
3202

    
    

    
    for (ImGuiTableSettings* settings = g.SettingsTables.begin(); settings != NULL; settings = g.SettingsTables.next_chunk(settings))

    


    

    
3203

    
    

    
        if (settings->ID == id)

    


    

    
3204

    
    

    
            return settings;

    


    

    
3205

    
    

    
    return NULL;

    


    

    
3206

    
    

    
}

    


    

    
3207

    
    

    

    


    

    
3208

    
    

    
// Get settings for a given table, NULL if none

    


    

    
3209

    
    

    
ImGuiTableSettings* ImGui::TableGetBoundSettings(ImGuiTable* table)

    


    

    
3210

    
    

    
{

    


    

    
3211

    
    

    
    if (table->SettingsOffset != -1)

    


    

    
3212

    
    

    
    {

    


    

    
3213

    
    

    
        ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;

    


    

    
3214

    
    

    
        ImGuiTableSettings* settings = g.SettingsTables.ptr_from_offset(table->SettingsOffset);

    


    

    
3215

    
    

    
        IM_ASSERT(settings->ID == table->ID);

    


    

    
3216

    
    

    
        if (settings->ColumnsCountMax >= table->ColumnsCount)

    


    

    
3217

    
    

    
            return settings; // OK

    


    

    
3218

    
    

    
        settings->ID = 0; // Invalidate storage, we won't fit because of a count change

    


    

    
3219

    
    

    
    }

    


    

    
3220

    
    

    
    return NULL;

    


    

    
3221

    
    

    
}

    


    

    
3222

    
    

    

    


    

    
3223

    
    

    
// Restore initial state of table (with or without saved settings)

    


    

    
3224

    
    

    
void ImGui::TableResetSettings(ImGuiTable* table)

    


    

    
3225

    
    

    
{

    


    

    
3226

    
    

    
    table->IsInitializing = table->IsSettingsDirty = true;

    


    

    
3227

    
    

    
    table->IsResetAllRequest = false;

    


    

    
3228

    
    

    
    table->IsSettingsRequestLoad = false;                   // Don't reload from ini

    


    

    
3229

    
    

    
    table->SettingsLoadedFlags = ImGuiTableFlags_None;      // Mark as nothing loaded so our initialized data becomes authoritative

    


    

    
3230

    
    

    
}

    


    

    
3231

    
    

    

    


    

    
3232

    
    

    
void ImGui::TableSaveSettings(ImGuiTable* table)

    


    

    
3233

    
    

    
{

    


    

    
3234

    
    

    
    table->IsSettingsDirty = false;

    


    

    
3235

    
    

    
    if (table->Flags & ImGuiTableFlags_NoSavedSettings)

    


    

    
3236

    
    

    
        return;

    


    

    
3237

    
    

    

    


    

    
3238

    
    

    
    // Bind or create settings data

    


    

    
3239

    
    

    
    ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;

    


    

    
3240

    
    

    
    ImGuiTableSettings* settings = TableGetBoundSettings(table);

    


    

    
3241

    
    

    
    if (settings == NULL)

    


    

    
3242

    
    

    
    {

    


    

    
3243

    
    

    
        settings = TableSettingsCreate(table->ID, table->ColumnsCount);

    


    

    
3244

    
    

    
        table->SettingsOffset = g.SettingsTables.offset_from_ptr(settings);

    


    

    
3245

    
    

    
    }

    


    

    
3246

    
    

    
    settings->ColumnsCount = (ImGuiTableColumnIdx)table->ColumnsCount;

    


    

    
3247

    
    

    

    


    

    
3248

    
    

    
    // Serialize ImGuiTable/ImGuiTableColumn into ImGuiTableSettings/ImGuiTableColumnSettings

    


    

    
3249

    
    

    
    IM_ASSERT(settings->ID == table->ID);

    


    

    
3250

    
    

    
    IM_ASSERT(settings->ColumnsCount == table->ColumnsCount && settings->ColumnsCountMax >= settings->ColumnsCount);

    


    

    
3251

    
    

    
    ImGuiTableColumn* column = table->Columns.Data;

    


    

    
3252

    
    

    
    ImGuiTableColumnSettings* column_settings = settings->GetColumnSettings();

    


    

    
3253

    
    

    

    


    

    
3254

    
    

    
    bool save_ref_scale = false;

    


    

    
3255

    
    

    
    settings->SaveFlags = ImGuiTableFlags_None;

    


    

    
3256

    
    

    
    for (int n = 0; n < table->ColumnsCount; n++, column++, column_settings++)

    


    

    
3257

    
    

    
    {

    


    

    
3258

    
    

    
        const float width_or_weight = (column->Flags & ImGuiTableColumnFlags_WidthStretch) ? column->StretchWeight : column->WidthRequest;

    


    

    
3259

    
    

    
        column_settings->WidthOrWeight = width_or_weight;

    


    

    
3260

    
    

    
        column_settings->Index = (ImGuiTableColumnIdx)n;

    


    

    
3261

    
    

    
        column_settings->DisplayOrder = column->DisplayOrder;

    


    

    
3262

    
    

    
        column_settings->SortOrder = column->SortOrder;

    


    

    
3263

    
    

    
        column_settings->SortDirection = column->SortDirection;

    


    

    
3264

    
    

    
        column_settings->IsEnabled = column->IsUserEnabled;

    


    

    
3265

    
    

    
        column_settings->IsStretch = (column->Flags & ImGuiTableColumnFlags_WidthStretch) ? 1 : 0;

    


    

    
3266

    
    

    
        if ((column->Flags & ImGuiTableColumnFlags_WidthStretch) == 0)

    


    

    
3267

    
    

    
            save_ref_scale = true;

    


    

    
3268

    
    

    

    


    

    
3269

    
    

    
        // We skip saving some data in the .ini file when they are unnecessary to restore our state.

    


    

    
3270

    
    

    
        // Note that fixed width where initial width was derived from auto-fit will always be saved as InitStretchWeightOrWidth will be 0.0f.

    


    

    
3271

    
    

    
        // FIXME-TABLE: We don't have logic to easily compare SortOrder to DefaultSortOrder yet so it's always saved when present.

    


    

    
3272

    
    

    
        if (width_or_weight != column->InitStretchWeightOrWidth)

    


    

    
3273

    
    

    
            settings->SaveFlags |= ImGuiTableFlags_Resizable;

    


    

    
3274

    
    

    
        if (column->DisplayOrder != n)

    


    

    
3275

    
    

    
            settings->SaveFlags |= ImGuiTableFlags_Reorderable;

    


    

    
3276

    
    

    
        if (column->SortOrder != -1)

    


    

    
3277

    
    

    
            settings->SaveFlags |= ImGuiTableFlags_Sortable;

    


    

    
3278

    
    

    
        if (column->IsUserEnabled != ((column->Flags & ImGuiTableColumnFlags_DefaultHide) == 0))

    


    

    
3279

    
    

    
            settings->SaveFlags |= ImGuiTableFlags_Hideable;

    


    

    
3280

    
    

    
    }

    


    

    
3281

    
    

    
    settings->SaveFlags &= table->Flags;

    


    

    
3282

    
    

    
    settings->RefScale = save_ref_scale ? table->RefScale : 0.0f;

    


    

    
3283

    
    

    

    


    

    
3284

    
    

    
    MarkIniSettingsDirty();

    


    

    
3285

    
    

    
}

    


    

    
3286

    
    

    

    


    

    
3287

    
    

    
void ImGui::TableLoadSettings(ImGuiTable* table)

    


    

    
3288

    
    

    
{

    


    

    
3289

    
    

    
    ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;

    


    

    
3290

    
    

    
    table->IsSettingsRequestLoad = false;

    


    

    
3291

    
    

    
    if (table->Flags & ImGuiTableFlags_NoSavedSettings)

    


    

    
3292

    
    

    
        return;

    


    

    
3293

    
    

    

    


    

    
3294

    
    

    
    // Bind settings

    


    

    
3295

    
    

    
    ImGuiTableSettings* settings;

    


    

    
3296

    
    

    
    if (table->SettingsOffset == -1)

    


    

    
3297

    
    

    
    {

    


    

    
3298

    
    

    
        settings = TableSettingsFindByID(table->ID);

    


    

    
3299

    
    

    
        if (settings == NULL)

    


    

    
3300

    
    

    
            return;

    


    

    
3301

    
    

    
        if (settings->ColumnsCount != table->ColumnsCount) // Allow settings if columns count changed. We could otherwise decide to return...

    


    

    
3302

    
    

    
            table->IsSettingsDirty = true;

    


    

    
3303

    
    

    
        table->SettingsOffset = g.SettingsTables.offset_from_ptr(settings);

    


    

    
3304

    
    

    
    }

    


    

    
3305

    
    

    
    else

    


    

    
3306

    
    

    
    {

    


    

    
3307

    
    

    
        settings = TableGetBoundSettings(table);

    


    

    
3308

    
    

    
    }

    


    

    
3309

    
    

    

    


    

    
3310

    
    

    
    table->SettingsLoadedFlags = settings->SaveFlags;

    


    

    
3311

    
    

    
    table->RefScale = settings->RefScale;

    


    

    
3312

    
    

    

    


    

    
3313

    
    

    
    // Serialize ImGuiTableSettings/ImGuiTableColumnSettings into ImGuiTable/ImGuiTableColumn

    


    

    
3314

    
    

    
    ImGuiTableColumnSettings* column_settings = settings->GetColumnSettings();

    


    

    
3315

    
    

    
    ImU64 display_order_mask = 0;

    


    

    
3316

    
    

    
    for (int data_n = 0; data_n < settings->ColumnsCount; data_n++, column_settings++)

    


    

    
3317

    
    

    
    {

    


    

    
3318

    
    

    
        int column_n = column_settings->Index;

    


    

    
3319

    
    

    
        if (column_n < 0 || column_n >= table->ColumnsCount)

    


    

    
3320

    
    

    
            continue;

    


    

    
3321

    
    

    

    


    

    
3322

    
    

    
        ImGuiTableColumn* column = &table->Columns[column_n];

    


    

    
3323

    
    

    
        if (settings->SaveFlags & ImGuiTableFlags_Resizable)

    


    

    
3324

    
    

    
        {

    


    

    
3325

    
    

    
            if (column_settings->IsStretch)

    


    

    
3326

    
    

    
                column->StretchWeight = column_settings->WidthOrWeight;

    


    

    
3327

    
    

    
            else

    


    

    
3328

    
    

    
                column->WidthRequest = column_settings->WidthOrWeight;

    


    

    
3329

    
    

    
            column->AutoFitQueue = 0x00;

    


    

    
3330

    
    

    
        }

    


    

    
3331

    
    

    
        if (settings->SaveFlags & ImGuiTableFlags_Reorderable)

    


    

    
3332

    
    

    
            column->DisplayOrder = column_settings->DisplayOrder;

    


    

    
3333

    
    

    
        else

    


    

    
3334

    
    

    
            column->DisplayOrder = (ImGuiTableColumnIdx)column_n;

    


    

    
3335

    
    

    
        display_order_mask |= (ImU64)1 << column->DisplayOrder;

    


    

    
3336

    
    

    
        column->IsUserEnabled = column->IsUserEnabledNextFrame = column_settings->IsEnabled;

    


    

    
3337

    
    

    
        column->SortOrder = column_settings->SortOrder;

    


    

    
3338

    
    

    
        column->SortDirection = column_settings->SortDirection;

    


    

    
3339

    
    

    
    }

    


    

    
3340

    
    

    

    


    

    
3341

    
    

    
    // Validate and fix invalid display order data

    


    

    
3342

    
    

    
    const ImU64 expected_display_order_mask = (settings->ColumnsCount == 64) ? ~0 : ((ImU64)1 << settings->ColumnsCount) - 1;

    


    

    
3343

    
    

    
    if (display_order_mask != expected_display_order_mask)

    


    

    
3344

    
    

    
        for (int column_n = 0; column_n < table->ColumnsCount; column_n++)

    


    

    
3345

    
    

    
            table->Columns[column_n].DisplayOrder = (ImGuiTableColumnIdx)column_n;

    


    

    
3346

    
    

    

    


    

    
3347

    
    

    
    // Rebuild index

    


    

    
3348

    
    

    
    for (int column_n = 0; column_n < table->ColumnsCount; column_n++)

    


    

    
3349

    
    

    
        table->DisplayOrderToIndex[table->Columns[column_n].DisplayOrder] = (ImGuiTableColumnIdx)column_n;

    


    

    
3350

    
    

    
}

    


    

    
3351

    
    

    

    


    

    
3352

    
    

    
static void TableSettingsHandler_ClearAll(ImGuiContext* ctx, ImGuiSettingsHandler*)

    


    

    
3353

    
    

    
{

    


    

    
3354

    
    

    
    ImGuiContext& g = *ctx;

    


    

    
3355

    
    

    
    for (int i = 0; i != g.Tables.GetMapSize(); i++)

    


    

    
3356

    
    

    
        if (ImGuiTable* table = g.Tables.TryGetMapData(i))

    


    

    
3357

    
    

    
            table->SettingsOffset = -1;

    


    

    
3358

    
    

    
    g.SettingsTables.clear();

    


    

    
3359

    
    

    
}

    


    

    
3360

    
    

    

    


    

    
3361

    
    

    
// Apply to existing windows (if any)

    


    

    
3362

    
    

    
static void TableSettingsHandler_ApplyAll(ImGuiContext* ctx, ImGuiSettingsHandler*)

    


    

    
3363

    
    

    
{

    


    

    
3364

    
    

    
    ImGuiContext& g = *ctx;

    


    

    
3365

    
    

    
    for (int i = 0; i != g.Tables.GetMapSize(); i++)

    


    

    
3366

    
    

    
        if (ImGuiTable* table = g.Tables.TryGetMapData(i))

    


    

    
3367

    
    

    
        {

    


    

    
3368

    
    

    
            table->IsSettingsRequestLoad = true;

    


    

    
3369

    
    

    
            table->SettingsOffset = -1;

    


    

    
3370

    
    

    
        }

    


    

    
3371
